data.name: Chamrosh
data.detailed_description:
Chamrosh is hack-n-slash Action game that came from Persian mythology.where players assume the role of FEREYDOUN in her quest to hunt down and dispose of demons in his way and find Chamrosh.

ENTER THE WORLD OF CHAMROSH


Chamrosh, The Guardian Of Persia, turned himself to stone with magic for being immortal to protect Persian lands forever, and only Kaveh the blacksmith's blood can turn him alive again,after thousand years the latest generation of Kaveh died and then you are the only one who can turn him alive.go and fine Chamrosh and release him.
there is a beast who is in prison inside the Damavand mountain,if demons win this war and kill legendary guardians,they will come to our world, they will release him and the world will end.
you most release Chamrosh to stop them and save the world.

PLAY AS A HIGHLY TRAINED DEMON SLAYER


Start your destiny with Fereydoun son of Kiamars, the latest generation of Kaveh the blacksmith, who is the last person that can turn Chamrosh alive.he is traveling to Chamrosh's world for the first time and will fight with orcs and demons .he is looking for who killed his father and his vengeance for Loss of his father makes him angry and wants to revenge.

meet elder gods and legends
for the first time we brings Persian elder gods and their powers in this game,you can see who they are and their abilities.they will help you in this journey and will give you their powers.listen to them,they will guide you,and you can meet Persian legendary warriors and kings of history.

KEY FEATURES

  • include Persian language
  • new cinematic system
  • Striking visuals enhanced with unreal engine 5 and makes game looks amazing and beautiful with new lighting system.
  • Engage in devastating boss battles against the mighty ِDemons and Orcs
  • Rage attribute to slash more enemies by getting gods power.
  • Fantasy mythological world filled with ferocious monsters from Persian Mythology.
  • Epic environments
  • Metahuman characters

Developer Team


this trailer is just a preview and will change in final release,we will try our best to fix all the bugs and improve animations and performance until final release and make you feel amazing.
